help.title: FAQs
help.description: Find answers to common questions about SMB app. If you can't find what you're looking for, feel free to contact our support team.

support.title: Still Need Help?
support.description: If you couldn't find the answer to your question, our support team is here to help!

info.title: About Our App
info.description: Welcome to SMB app, your trusted companion for managing your daily tasks and staying organized. We're committed to providing you with the best user experience.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We strive to create innovative solutions that simplify your life and enhance productivity. Our team is dedicated to continuous improvement and delivering exceptional value to our users.

features.question: Features
features.answer:
Intuitive user interface with dark/light theme support
Secure authentication and data protection
Cross-platform compatibility
Regular updates and new features
24/7 customer support

team.question: Development Team
team.answer: This app is developed by a passionate team of engineers and designers who are committed to creating the best possible experience for our users.
